alert.note: Alert for Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:55AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County through 1230 PM MST... At 1155 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walnut Canyon National Monument, or 13 miles southeast of Flagstaff, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Coconino County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
